elements.description: Button to submit the search query

assertions: expect(page).to_have_title('Automation Testing Practice WebSite for QA and Developers')
expect(page.get_by_text('Automation Testing Practice WebSite for QA and Developers')).to_be_visible()
expect(page.locator('text=Sample applications for practice test automation')).to_be_visible()

expect(page.get_by_role('heading', name='Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice')).to_be_visible()
